name: dog-api
description: A simple api to practice reading and writing to a dynamodb

scripts.create-table: aws dynamodb create-table --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 --table-name dogs --attribute-definitions AttributeName=id,AttributeType=S AttributeName=name,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=id,KeyType=HASH AttributeName=name,KeyType=RANGE --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=5,WriteCapacityUnits=5
